languages.text: {n}Потянувшись за кубком, вы как бы невзначай цепляете локтем ничейную плитку и скидываете с рук лишнюю. Теперь у вас на руках отличный расклад, но вы готовы поклясться, что Джай заметила вашу уловку. Заметила и промолчала.{/n}

{n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Потянувшись за кубком, вы как бы невзначай цепляете локтем ничейную плитку и скидываете с рук лишнюю. Теперь у вас на руках отличный расклад, но вы готовы поклясться, что Джай заметила вашу уловку. Заметила и промолчала.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

{n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

{n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

{n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你伸手去拿酒杯，胳膊“一不小心”夹住了一张没人要的牌，将牌扫到了手里。现在，你手中的牌已经非常强了。不过，你敢肯定婕伊已经看到了你的小动作，但即便如此，她也什么都没说。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你伸手去拿酒杯，胳膊“一不小心”夹住了一张没人要的牌，将牌扫到了手里。现在，你手中的牌已经非常强了。不过，你敢肯定婕伊已经看到了你的小动作，但即便如此，她也什么都没说。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはゴブレットに手を伸ばし、『偶然』にも予備のタイルを肘でキャッチし、空いた手に入れる。これであなたは素晴らしいタイルのセットを手に入れた。だが、ジェイがあなたのかすかな動きに気づいたのは間違いないだろう。それでも、彼女は何も言わなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはゴブレットに手を伸ばし、『偶然』にも予備のタイルを肘でキャッチし、空いた手に入れる。これであなたは素晴らしいタイルのセットを手に入れた。だが、ジェイがあなたのかすかな動きに気づいたのは間違いないだろう。それでも、彼女は何も言わなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alargas la mano para recoger tu cáliz y «accidentalmente» le das un codazo a una ficha suelta, haciendo que caiga en tu otra mano. Ahora tienes una mano excelente, aunque jurarías que Jae ha visto tu jugada. la ha visto sin decir nada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alargas la mano para recoger tu cáliz y «accidentalmente» le das un codazo a una ficha suelta, haciendo que caiga en tu otra mano. Ahora tienes una mano excelente, aunque jurarías que Jae ha visto tu jugada. la ha visto sin decir nada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous tendez la main vers votre verre et, « par inadvertance », faites glisser une tuile isolée de votre coude vers votre main libre. Vous voilà désormais avec une main excellente, mais vous êtes presque {mf|sûr|sûre} que Jae vous a vu faire. Cependant, elle ne dit rien.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous tendez la main vers votre verre et, « par inadvertance », faites glisser une tuile isolée de votre coude vers votre main libre. Vous voilà désormais avec une main excellente, mais vous êtes presque {mf|sûr|sûre} que Jae vous a vu faire. Cependant, elle ne dit rien.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du greifst nach deinem Becher und berührst mit deinem Ellbogen "aus Versehen" einen übrig gebliebenen Stein, den du mit deiner freien Hand heimlich auffängst. Dieser Stein macht deinen Satz ganz ausgezeichnet, aber du könntest schwören, dass Jae dich dabei beobachtet hat. Sie hat gesehen, was du getan hast, aber sie hat nichts gesagt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du greifst nach deinem Becher und berührst mit deinem Ellbogen "aus Versehen" einen übrig gebliebenen Stein, den du mit deiner freien Hand heimlich auffängst. Dieser Stein macht deinen Satz ganz ausgezeichnet, aber du könntest schwören, dass Jae dich dabei beobachtet hat. Sie hat gesehen, was du getan hast, aber sie hat nichts gesagt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kadehine uzandığın sırada bileğine "yanlışlıkla" yedek bir karo yapışıyor ve boştaki eline kayıveriyor. Artık müthiş bir karo dizisine sahipsin ancak Jae'ın bu küçük hareketini gördüğüne yemin edebilirsin. Görüp hiçbir şey söylemedi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You reach for your goblet and "accidentally" catch a spare tile with your elbow, sweeping it into your free hand. Now you have an excellent set of tiles, but you would swear that Jae saw your little move. She saw it and said nothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadehine uzanıyorsun ve bileğine "yanlışlıkla" yedek bir karo yapışıyor ve serbest eline kayıveriyor. Artık müthiş bir karo dizisine sahipsin ancak Jae'ın bu küçük hareketini gördüğüne yemin edebilirsin. Bunu gördü ve hiçbir şey söylemedi.{/n}
